name: Death in Skeletopia
description:
In the dark recesses of the dungeon, skeletons attack from all sides wanting to add you to there number.  Spawned from the tombs that are just lying around every corner, they hunt in packs and seem to multiply with every one that you kill.  Only time will tell if you will succumb to their deadly attacks.

"Death in Skeletopia" is a game jam entry for GameDev.TV's 2022 Jam.  This is my first game jam entry and I hope to do more in the future.  If you have time please let me know what you think.

Thanks for taking the time to play.

I want to thank the creators of the assets that I used to make this game.

Game Asset: https://kaylousberg.itch.io/

Game Music: https://sonatina.itch.io/

Game Sounds: https://kenney.itch.io/
